src:
FOTO: Ob zgodovinski imitaciji tekle solze, javila se je tudi Elda Viler
Ana Dežman se je tokrat preobrazila v svojo mamo.
03 Nov 2019, 21:15 by P. K.



FOTO: Facebook



Ana Dežman je navdušila tudi svojo mamo. FOTO: Facebook


V tokratni zabavni oddaji Znan obraz ima svoj glas je najbolj navdušila Ana Dežman, ki je morala stopiti v čevlje svoje mame, slovenske popevkarice Elde Viler. S pesmijo Ti si moja ljubezen je navdušila žirijo, sotekmovalce in publiko. Lea Sirk je točila solze, tudi Lara Komar je postala zelo čustvena. Največje presenečenje pa je Ani pripravil voditelj Denis Avdić, ki je takoj po nastopu v živo poklical Eldo. Ta ni mogla skriti navdušenja nad svojo hčerko in čustveni nastop je pustil tako močan pečat, da je Ana na koncu slavila. 


Ana Dežman je navdušila tudi svojo mamo. FOTO: Facebook

Kot četrti žirant pa se je tokrat odlično znašel slovenski raper Challe Salle, ki je lahko opazoval prav posebno preobrazbo. Na odru se je namreč predstavila Eva Boto, ki je imitirala prav njega. Eva, ki je njegova velika oboževalka, ga je na koncu prav simpatično uščipnila v lička.
text:
PHOTO: Elda Wheeler has also responded to a historical imitation of tears
Ana Dezman transformed into her mother this time.
03 Nov 2019, 21:15 by P.K.



PHOTO: Facebook



Ana Dezman also impressed her mother. PHOTO: Facebook


In this entertaining show Known Face Has Its Voice, Ana Dežman was most impressed, and she had to step into the shoes of her mother, Slovenian singer-songwriter Elde Wheeler. The song You Are My Love has impressed the jury, the contestants and the audience. Lea Sirk poured tears, and Lara Komar also became very emotional. The biggest surprise, however, was Ani's presenter, Denis Avdić, who immediately called Eldo live. She couldn't hide her enthusiasm for her daughter, and her emotional performance left such a strong mark that Ana ended up celebrating.


Ana Dezman also impressed her mother. PHOTO: Facebook

Slovenian rapper Challe Salle excelled as the fourth guarantor this time and was able to observe a special transformation. Namely, Eva Boto introduced herself on stage, imitating him. Eve, who is a huge fan of his, finally pinched him sympathetically into her cheeks.
